-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema mydb
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS `mydb` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8 ;
USE `mydb` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `mydb`.`equipa`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`equipa` (
  `idEquipa` INT NOT NULL,
  `nome` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idEquipa`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `mydb`.`requisicao`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`requisicao` (
  `idRequisicao` INT NOT NULL,
  `entregue` TINYINT NULL,
  `idEquipa` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idRequisicao`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `mydb`.`material`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`material` (
  `idMaterial` INT NOT NULL,
  `nome` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `qtd` INT NULL,
  `custo` FLOAT NULL,
  `idRequisicao` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idMaterial`, `idRequisicao`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `mydb`.`utente`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`utente` (
  `idutente` INT NOT NULL,
  `nome` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idutente`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `mydb`.`caso`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`caso` (
  `idcaso` INT NOT NULL,
  `data` DATE NULL,
  `idutente` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idcaso`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `mydb`.`contacto`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`contacto` (
  `idutente` INT NOT NULL,
  `idcaso` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idutente`, `idcaso`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `mydb`.`civil`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `mydb`.`civil` (
  `idfiscalizado` INT NOT NULL,
  `nome` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `data` DATE NULL,
  `fiscalizado` TINYINT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idfiscalizado`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;
